RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Mobility
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine the impact on a pawn's mobility when said pawn is full of prey. It serves as a soft limit on capacity, as an immobile pawn can still be hand-fed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Godlike Agility
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] makes walking around with the weight of multiple full grown people hanging off of [PAWN_objective] look effortless, in a way that seems to defy the laws of physics.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Belly acrobat
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] moves freely while full of prey, as though [PAWN_possessive] belly wasn't there.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Belly-nimble
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] knows how to keep [PAWN_possessive] balance with a bulging belly.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Belly-functional
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is affected by their prey's weight like anyone else.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Belly-clumsy
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is unsteady with a big belly and prone to tumbling whenever [PAWN_possessive] prey decide to kick around.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Belly-dysfunctional
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] can barely stay on [PAWN_possessive] feet with a big, round belly, let alone jog around.
